title: Inked In Blood -Awakening Vesuvius (EP) - 2003
description:

The result was Ã¢â‚¬Å“Sometimes We Are BeautifulÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, a 2007 record that was heavier and more melodic than any of their previous works. The hooks were founded on addictive melodies and singable choruses; in fact Ã¢â‚¬Å“Sometimes We Are BeautifulÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ was rooted firmly in the tradition of Ã¢â‚¬Ëœevolving hardcoreÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ where the energy, intelligence and beauty of a bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sound reflected the current state of the scene.
